Main Research Papers and Publications by Teresa Ter-Minassian

Incidenza delle varie forme di imposta sul valore aggiunto, nel breve periodo in C. Cosciani (ed.), Giuffré, Studi Sull'Imposta sul valore aggiunto, Milan, 1968.

The Weighted Budget Balance Approach to Fiscal Analysis: A Methodology and Some Case Studies (with J. Borpujari), IMF Staff Papers, November 1973.

The Treatment of the Effects of Fiscal Variables on Real Aggregates in Macroeconomic Models: A survey, IMF Working Paper, September 1974.

Economic Impact of Alternative Forms of Financing: The Budget Deficit (with R. Di Calogero), IMF Working Paper, October 1974.

The European Monetary System and Fiscal Policies (with V. Tanzi) in S. Cnossen (ed.): Tax Coordination in the European Community, Kluwer, Holland, 1987.

IMF/WB/OECD/EBRD: A Study of the Soviet Economy, Vol. I-III (as head of the Task Force in the IMF).

Setting Up a Treasury in Economies in Transition (with P. Parente and P. Martinez-Mendez), IMF Working Paper, February 1995.

The Distributional Effects of Public Expenditure: Update and Overview (with G. Schwartz), IMF Working Paper, August 1995.

Borrowing by Subnational Governments: Issues and Selected International Experiences, IMF PPAA, April 1996.

Macroeconomic Dimensions of Public Finance. Essays in Honor of V. Tanzi, (co-editor with Mr. Blejer), Routledge, United Kingdom, 1997.

Fiscal Policy and Economic Reform, (co-editor with Mr. Blejer), Routledge, United Kingdom, 1997.

Financial Management of Government Operations: Selected Macroeconomic and Institutional Aspects; in Proceedings of the IXth Regional Seminar on Fiscal Policy, ECLAC, Chile, 1997.

The Role of Fiscal Policy in Sustainable Stabilization: Evidence from Latin America (with G. Schwartz), IMF Working Paper, August 1997.

Fiscal Federalism in Theory and Practice (editor, and author of Chapters 1, 7, and 18), IMF, 1997.

Decentralization and Macroeconomic Management, IMF Working Paper, November 1997.

Selected Issues in Public Debt Management; in Proceedings of the Xth Regional Seminar on Fiscal Policy, ECLAC, Chile, 1998.

Descentralização e Gestão Macroeconômica; in OECD-ESAF: Conferença Internacional em Decentralização, Relações Fiscaís e Intergovernamentaís e Governança Macroeconômica, Brasilia, D.F., 1999.

The Distributional Effects of Public Expenditure (with G. Schwartz), in Journal of Economic Surveys, July, 2000.
